General.Name: Saraiva Livreiros S.A. - em Recuperação Judicial
General.Description: Saraiva Livreiros S.A. - em Recuperação Judicial retails books and stationery products. The company also offers office supplies, electronic games, software, toys, gift cards, and prepaid cards. It sells its products through stores and e-commerce platform. Saraiva Livreiros S.A. - em Recuperação Judicial was founded in 1914 and is headquartered in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua Henrique Schaumann, 270, São Paulo, SP, Brazil

0.Name: Mr. Jorge Saraiva Neto
